chapter.title: Requirements for version 1.0
chapter.para: The first major version of the application is intended to be a simple tool for recording, editing and mixing of audio data.

section.title: Requirements Version 0.1.0
section.para: The goal is to implement enough functionality so that the application is useful for playing back audio files. The first version is a marking point where some of the basic application design is worked out, which includes communication between GUI and backend, data structures for the project, serialisation and the audio engine.

listitem.para: The Project window is the main window in &GMOJO_APP; where editing takes place.
The Project setup dialog contains the general settings for the project. The only field in the project setup dialog that will be used in the first version is the sample rate.
The device setup dialog is where the audio driver is selected
The connections window is where input and output busses are defined to route audio between &GMOJO_APP; and the audio hardware.
